name: GitStart
headline: Pull Requests as a Service
description: GitStart accelerates software engineers with Pull Requests as a Service. Assign tickets to GitStart Bot, go to sleep, and wake up with PRs. GitStart Bot automatically manages thousands of AI models and full-time engineers and runs peer reviews until PRs are ready to be merged. It’s scalable, flexible, and quality is guaranteed: you only pay for merged PRs.

##  Endlessly scale your engineering 
##  Endlessly scale your engineering 
Use remote developers and AI agents to seamlessly scale your eng team up and down as needed. Simply assign us tickets and we'll handle the rest. 
Start saving more and shipping faster with GitStart. 
[Start shipping ](https://www.gitstart.com/<https:/clients.gitstart.com>) [Book a demo ](https://www.gitstart.com/<https:/cal.com/team/gitstart/intro>)
![blog image](https://www.gitstart.com/_astro/hero-gitstart.Cwegn2jo_1b3XDl.svg)
Shipping 15,000+ PRs at forward-thinking companies like

How it works

![Assign-active-icon](https://www.gitstart.com/icons/gradient/adjust.svg)
Assign

![Ship-icon](https://www.gitstart.com/icons/rocket.svg)

Ship
1
You assign us tickets from your upcoming sprint
GitStart's AI Ticket Studio will convert your issues into well-scoped ticket by loading context from your codebase and asking clarifying questions to your team.
Assign tickets from
![github logo](https://www.gitstart.com/client-logos/github.svg)![gitlab logo](https://www.gitstart.com/client-logos/gitlab.svg)![jira logo](https://www.gitstart.com/client-logos/jira.svg)![linear logo](https://www.gitstart.com/client-logos/linear.svg)![trello logo](https://www.gitstart.com/client-logos/trello.svg)![asana logo](https://www.gitstart.com/client-logos/asana.svg)![monday logo](https://www.gitstart.com/client-logos/monday.svg)
2
Get real-time updates about work in progress
Stay in the know with daily updates in Slack that summarize the status of every ticket assigned to GitStart.
3
Review PRs and merge when they pass code review
GitStart runs multiple reviews and QA before submitting pull requests. Request changes (all in-scope changes are free), or merge them directly from your Git hosting provider.

Whatever you're tackling this quarter, GitStart can help.
Start with well-defined use cases and get more complex things done over time, from adding test coverage all the way to building C++ compilers.

generated_description:
GitStart is a dynamic startup based in San Francisco, founded in 2021, and a proud member of Y Combinator Batch S19. Its mission? To provide "Pull Requests as a Service"—a novel solution that enables companies to streamline their software engineering processes effortlessly.

The core concept is simple: Assign tickets to the GitStart Bot, hit the pillow, and wake up to ready-to-merge pull requests (PRs). By harnessing a blend of AI models and a talented team of full-time engineers, GitStart manages everything from ticket scoping to peer reviews. This means you're only paying for the PRs that get merged, ensuring costs are tightly aligned with value.

With a compact team of 19, GitStart has already made a significant impact, handling over 15,000 PRs for various innovative companies like Cal.com and Firefox. Their service is designed to let engineering teams scale flexibly—adjusting the volume of work as needed without the overhead of traditional hiring. 

The process works like this:
1. **Assign:** You submit tickets, and their AI Ticket Studio creates well-defined tasks by referencing your codebase.
2. **Update:** Keep in the loop with real-time updates on ticket progress sent directly to your Slack.
3. **Review:** GitStart handles extensive QA and code review, allowing you to merge only after the highest standards of quality are met.

GitStart isn’t just about delivering PRs but about enabling companies to accelerate their development cycles while maintaining a lean operation. They emphasize security with a feature called GitSlice, which allows clients to share only the necessary portions of their codebase needed for the developers to complete tasks. 

In today’s fast-paced tech landscape, GitStart positions itself as a crucial ally for companies looking to efficiently execute their engineering tasks while focusing on their core product. For more information, you can visit [GitStart](https://www.gitstart.com). 

In summary, if you’re looking to ship code faster without the headache of managing a full engineering team, GitStart could be the solution you've been searching for.
